title: Memetic Warfare: World Word War
description:
This massively multiplayer experience goes beyond gaming and simulation to track the spread of memetic infections in real time, combining features of chat roulette and chan image boards.

*Earn credits by accepting random memes (viral ideas linking visual and linguistic stimuli).

*Use credits to create new memes and bribe new hosts. 

*Reject memes to weaken opponents. 

*Track global replication and saturation of memeplex. 

*Devastate the opposition. Conquer the world
